NewsArticle.Title: Astrid Redemption Catastrophe(updated)
NewsArticle.Content: Due to Server Error, and user exploitation, every user who participated in Astrid Remdemption and abused the bug will be reset to their character on 4/01/02 12:00am PST. I apologize in advance for any trouble this may cause, but this is the only way to fix the error. Note: Any user who will use this situation to attempt to dupe items, or gold will have their account placed jeopardy. Astrid Redemption Will be rescheduled to 4/02/02 at 1:00pm PST. Once Again I apologize.
